title: VitaJuwel ViA Bottle, Jubilee Ayurveda
author: Universal Companies
description: Inspire Healthy Habits with Gemstone Water milk opal - amethyst - clear quartz - lapis lazuli - garnet - carnelian - orange calcite Get your doshas in balance with this fascinating composition of hand-selected gems. The only gemstone wand with a unique curved surface. The word Ayurveda means "science of life" and is the traditional holistic system of Indian medicine. The more than 3000-year old concept also uses gems for therapeutic purposes. Ayurveda gem therapy claims that every gem has properties that can help to balance specific doshas. Our friend Walter von Holst, one of the most important representatives of modern crystal healing research, helped us creating this blend with a focus on the seven basic Ayurvedic tissues. With this unique, colorful blend we'd like to celebrate the increasing acceptance of alternative healing approaches in the tradition of Ayurveda and the concept of modern crystal healing, for which VitaJuwel stands like no other. Crystal Virtues Inspiration, Clarity, Focus, Intuition, Imagination, Wisdom, Communication, Self-Expression, Openness, Love, Harmony, Balance, Self-Confidence, Willpower, Inner Strength, Sensuality, Warmth, Sensitivity, Self-Acceptance, Protection, Security Included in Delivery glass cylinder, lid, gempod Specification diameter 6,7 cm., height 22,5cm, volume 500ml Material borosilicate glass, gemstones, stainless steel, bpa-free plastic, silicone Care glass cylinder dishwasher-proof, handwash lid and gempod, disassemble gempod before cleaning
